name: Lu:Cid
summary:
Cid is cooped up in quarantine with little to do but feed the cat, mope around, read, and dream. When they sleep, their worries manifest as strange dream worlds with their own internal consistency. Explore to learn more about their anxieties surrounding the past, future, and present. Collect "dream effects" which change their appearance and grant various powers. Reunite with childhood cats and have them join your dream party.

All in all, I promise you, Cid is going to be OK. But what has happened to Lu?
